p: 2) While this is a qualitative study, the findings contain long descriptions of the context and analyses of patients' experiences and perceptions. However, very few quotes are used to support these analyses for the 4 main themes. In addition, few of the quotes that are used support the claims that are made. In light of this, I recommend to shorten the analyses in the findings, distill the absolute essence for each theme and support it with patients' words.
